statements: SELECT * FROM Geospatial_Geothermal_Data;
SELECT id, temperature FROM Geospatial_Geothermal_Data WHERE temperature > 80;
SELECT location, temperature FROM Geospatial_Geothermal_Data ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT id, exploration_date FROM Geospatial_Geothermal_Data WHERE exploration_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Geospatial_Geothermal_Data WHERE mineral_content LIKE '%gold%';
SELECT id, location, temperature, mineral_content, exploration_date FROM Geospatial_Geothermal_Data WHERE temperature > 100 ORDER BY exploration_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Geospatial_Geothermal_Data WHERE mineral_content LIKE '%gold%' AND temperature BETWEEN 150 AND 200 ORDER BY temperature ASC, exploration_date DESC;
SELECT id, location, temperature FROM Geospatial_Geothermal_Data WHERE location ST_Within(ST_GeomFromText('POLYGON((0 0, 10 0, 10 10, 0 10, 0 0))'), 1) ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, exploration_date FROM Geospatial_Geothermal_Data WHERE YEAR(exploration_date) = 2021 OR YEAR(exploration_date) = 2022 ORDER BY exploration_date ASC;
SELECT id, temperature, mineral_content FROM Geospatial_Geothermal_Data WHERE temperature < 50 AND mineral_content IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM geospatial_data;
SELECT id, location, temperature FROM geospatial_data WHERE temperature > 20;
SELECT id, location, geological_feature FROM geospatial_data ORDER BY location;
SELECT site_name, depth, temperature_range FROM geothermal_exploration_data WHERE depth < 1000;
SELECT * FROM geospatial_data WHERE geological_feature LIKE 'volcano%';
SELECT id, location, temperature, geological_feature FROM geospatial_data ORDER BY temperature DESC, id ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM geothermal_exploration_data WHERE depth < 100 ORDER BY site_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, site_name, depth, temperature_range FROM geothermal_exploration_data WHERE JSON_CONTAINS(temperature_range, '"low"') LIMIT 5
SELECT id, location, temperature, geological_feature FROM geospatial_data WHERE temperature > 25 AND geological_feature = 'volcano' LIMIT 5
SELECT id, site_name, depth, temperature_range FROM geothermal_exploration_data WHERE depth BETWEEN 50 AND 200 AND JSON_EXTRACT(temperature_range, '$.high') > 150 LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM geospatial_data
SELECT name FROM geothermal_exploration_data WHERE temperature > 80
SELECT site_name, suitability_score FROM site_selection ORDER BY suitability_score DESC
SELECT well_id, temperature FROM geothermal_exploration_data WHERE depth < 1000
SELECT id, location_geom FROM geospatial_data
SELECT * FROM geospatial_data ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT name, location_geom FROM geospatial_data WHERE id > 5;
SELECT temperature, depth FROM geothermal_exploration_data WHERE temperature > 80 AND depth < 1000 ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT id, site_name, suitability_score FROM site_selection WHERE suitability_score >= 70 AND selected = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM site_selection WHERE id IN (SELECT id FROM geothermal_exploration_data WHERE temperature > 90);
SELECT * FROM GeospatialData;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM GeospatialData ORDER BY latitude DESC;
SELECT site_name, site_location FROM Sites WHERE geospatial_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM GeothermalData WHERE temperature > 70;
SELECT analysis_description, date FROM Analysis WHERE site_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM GeospatialData;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM GeospatialData ORDER BY latitude DESC;
SELECT * FROM GeothermalData WHERE depth > 500 AND temperature > 100;
SELECT site_name, temperature FROM Sites JOIN GeothermalData ON Sites.geothermal_id = GeothermalData.id;
SELECT site_name, analysis_description FROM Sites JOIN Analysis ON Sites.site_id = Analysis.site_id WHERE Analysis.date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM GeospatialData;
SELECT id, longitude, latitude FROM GeospatialData WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT geo_description FROM GeospatialData WHERE latitude > 40.0;
SELECT geo_type, COUNT(*) AS count FROM GeospatialData GROUP BY geo_type;
SELECT * FROM SpatialAnalysis ORDER BY analysis_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM GeospatialData WHERE latitude > 40.0 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT geo_description, longitude FROM GeospatialData WHERE geo_type = 'city' LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM GeothermalExplorationData WHERE temperature < 200.0 ORDER BY depth ASC;
SELECT geological_feature, depth FROM GeothermalExplorationData WHERE temperature BETWEEN 150.0 AND 250.0;
SELECT id, analysis_result FROM SpatialAnalysis WHERE analysis_id = 12345 AND geothermal_data_id IS NOT NULL;
